metadata.title: CVE-2017-16669 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
coders/wpg.c in GraphicsMagick 1.3.26 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (heap-based buffer overflow and application crash) orpossibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted file, related to theAcquireCacheNexus function in magick/pixel_cache.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16669` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.23-1ubuntu0.5
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.23-1ubuntu0.5
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.23-1ubuntu0.5
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.3.23-1ubuntu0.5
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.3.23-1ubuntu0.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.23-1ubuntu0.5').
